title: Functions for Tabular Reporting
text: flextable package provides framework easily create tables reporting publications. Tables can easily formatted set verbs bold(), color(), can receive header one line, cells can merged contain image. package make possible build table publication data.frame. Tables can embedded within HTML, PDF, Word PowerPoint documents R Markdown documents within Microsoft Word PowerPoint documents package officer. Tables can also rendered R plots graphic files (png, pdf jpeg).  flextable object data.frame representation. API available let R users create tables reporting control formatting properties layout. package provides functions give control : header, body footer content text, paragraphs, cells border formatting element displayed values
code: set_flextable_defaults(   font.family = "Arial", font.size = 10,    border.color = "gray")  flextable(head(cars)) %>%    bold(part = "header") %>%    add_footer_lines("The 'cars' dataset") flextable(mtcars) %>%    theme_vanilla() %>%    save_as_docx(path = "mytable.docx")
